attributes.action: Allow university students to END their tenancy agreement earlier.
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to pass a law allowing students no longer living in their accommodation to end the tenancy contract earlier.
attributes.background: Universities are charging students even though classes have moved online and students have moved back home. Fees are very expensive adding a great financial burden to families. Jobs have been lost due to COVID but we are still paying for accommodation without using it.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553285

We have also published the following related petition, which you might like to sign: 

Reimburse student rents for all accommodation not used during this academic year: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560735
